thread.title: Russia strikes kill 39 civilians, 14 ISIS, Nusra Front militants | Lifestyle
thread.title_full: Russia strikes kill 39 civilians, 14 ISIS, Nusra Front militants | Lifestyle | News | Qatar Day

author: alarabiya
title: Russia strikes kill 39 civilians, 14 ISIS, Nusra Front militants | Lifestyle
text:
At least 39 civilians, including eight children and eight women, have been killed in Russian air strikes in Syria in the past four days, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said on Saturday.
 It said 14 fighters had been killed - 12 from ISIS militant group around the eastern city of Raqqa, and two from the Al-Qaeda-linked Nusra Front. Observatory director Rami Abdulrahman said the figures only included those which had been verified.
